captions.text: Boom Clap Boom Boom Boom Clap
My heart flutters when we talk on the phone
But when we actually meet, it's awkward
What kind of man is like that?
What kind of relationship are we in?
But I like you even though you talk like that
Boom Clap Boom Boom Boom Clap
You felt like you were mine
I feel like I'd fall into you as I get to know you more
I like you more because it's way better than I thought
It's hard to keep playing around for long
I want to keep this pitapating feeling
Our relationship is deeper than anyone
Even though you pretend you don't know
You might lost it if you take it too slow
I want to hear that words
Am I too fast? You say you don't know anything
Let's just love you love you love
You felt like you were mine
I feel like I'd fall into you as I get to know you more

comments.author: You tube두둥's

comments.text:
Foreigners seem to be so surprised and moreover flustered when they know 
about the actual age of Koreans, but this is because we Koreans have 
different genes with Americans or Europeans. It is also considered good 
looking the more younger we look in Korea. I had this absurd experience 
when a foreign girl who was like 3 years younger than me looked at me as if 
she was flustered after knowing that I was like 2 years older than she 
expected. So my point is that foreigners should not make assumptions of 
ages of a Korean just by looking at their looks. There are some Korean 
actors than look 10 years younger than their actual age.﻿
